document.discussion_title: Beltre at DH, Beltran sits for day game
document.topic_text: Rec Ray Carlin-USA TODAY Sports Its a hot one today in Arlington, so old man Carlos Beltran is getting the day off, while old man Adrian Beltre is the DH, keeping him from going out into the field and melting while the Rockies are batting. The lineup:
